Descripción: Passionate about Technology and Software Development, with a problem-solving mindset and a commitment to continuous learning. Specialized in web application development.
DashboardDescription: Interactive website that fetches and displays real-time data from cryptocurrency market APIs and the Merval stock index. Built using React for the frontend and Node.js for the backend.
LaDescription: E-Commerce platform featuring a product section with a dynamic pagination system and advanced filter management. Developed using React.
sobreMip1: My name is Máximo Verdi. I’ve always been passionate about computers, technology, and video games. My journey into programming began during the quarantine when I developed a website for a shower door business. It was at that moment I realized how much I enjoyed programming, although I hadn’t paid much attention to it before then.
sobremip2: Last year (2023), I decided to dive deeper into this field and enrolled in a Full Stack Web Development diploma program at UTN. Currently, I’m studying the Backend portion, where I’m expanding my knowledge in technologies like Node.js, databases, and APIs.
sobremip3: My main goal is to grow as a developer, continue learning, and work on challenging projects that allow me to expand my skills in both Frontend and Backend development.
